foreignData.name: Arkane Handwerkerin
foreignData.text:
{2}{U}, {T}: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl zieht eine Karte und schickt dann eine Karte aus seiner Hand ins Exil. Falls auf diese Weise eine Kreaturenkarte ins Exil geschickt wird, erzeugt der Spieler einen Spielstein, der eine Kopie jener Karte ist.
Wenn die Arkane Handwerkerin das Spiel verlässt, schicke zu Beginn des nächsten Endsegments alle mit ihr erzeugten Spielsteine ins Exil.

foreignData.name: Artesana arcana
foreignData.text:
{2}{U}, {T}: El jugador objetivo roba una carta, luego exilia una carta de su mano. Si se exilia una carta de criatura de esta manera, ese jugador crea una ficha que es una copia de esa carta.
Cuando la Artesana arcana deje el campo de batalla, exilia todas las fichas creadas con ella al comienzo del próximo paso final.

foreignData.name: Artisane ésotérique
foreignData.text:
{2}{U}, {T} : Un joueur ciblé pioche une carte, puis exile une carte de sa main. Si une carte de créature est exilée de cette manière, ce joueur crée un jeton qui est une copie de cette carte.
Quand l'Artisane ésotérique quitte le champ de bataille, exilez tous les jetons créés par elle au début de la prochaine étape de fin.

foreignData.name: Artigiana Arcana
foreignData.text:
{2}{U}, {T}: Un giocatore bersaglio pesca una carta, poi esilia una carta dalla sua mano. Se una carta creatura viene esiliata in questo modo, quel giocatore crea una pedina che è una copia di quella carta.
Quando l'Artigiana Arcana lascia il campo di battaglia, esilia tutte le pedine che ha creato all'inizio della prossima sottofase finale.

foreignData.name: 秘儀の職工
foreignData.text:
{2}{U}, {T}：プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは、カード１枚を引き、その後自分の手札からカード１枚を追放する。これによりクリーチャー・カードが追放されたなら、そのプレイヤーはそのカードのコピーであるトークン１体を生成する。
秘儀の職工が戦場を離れたとき、次の終了ステップの開始時に、これにより生成されたすべてのトークンを追放する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード

foreignData.name: Artesã Arcana
foreignData.text:
{2}{U}, {T}: O jogador alvo compra um card e depois exila um card de sua própria mão. Se um card de criatura for exilado desta forma, aquele jogador cria uma ficha que é uma cópia daquele card.
Quando Artesã Arcana deixar o campo de batalha, no início da próxima etapa final exile todas as fichas criadas por ela.

foreignData.name: Волшебная Ремесленница
foreignData.text:
{2}{U}, {T}: целевой игрок берет одну карту, затем изгоняет одну карту из своей руки. Если таким образом изгоняется карта существа, тот игрок создает одну фишку, являющуюся копией той карты.
Когда Волшебная Ремесленница покидает поле битвы, изгоните все созданные ею фишки в начале следующего заключительного шага.

foreignData.name: 秘法工匠
foreignData.text:
{2}{U}，{T}：目标牌手抓一张牌，然后从其手上放逐一张牌。如果以此法放逐的是生物牌，则该牌手派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为该牌的复制品。
当秘法工匠离开战场，在下一个结束步骤开始时，放逐所有以它派出的衍生物。

foreignData.name: 秘法工匠
foreignData.text:
{2}{U}，{T}：目標玩家抽一張牌，然後從其手上放逐一張牌。如果以此法放逐的是生物牌，則該玩家派出一個衍生物，此衍生物為該牌的複製品。
當秘法工匠離開戰場，在下一個結束步驟開始時，放逐所有以它派出的衍生物。

name: Arcane Artisan
originalText:
{2}{U}, {T}: Target player draws a card, then exiles a card from their hand. If a creature card is exiled this way, that player creates a token that's a copy of that card.
When Arcane Artisan leaves the battlefield, exile all tokens created with it at the beginning of the next end step.

rulings.text: If a card in exile has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.

If the card copied by the token had any “when [this permanent] enters the battlefield” abilities, then the token also has those abilities and will trigger them when it’s created. Similarly, any “as [this permanent] enters the battlefield” or “[this permanent] enters the battlefield with” abilities that the token has copied will also work.
If Arcane Artisan leaves the battlefield before its activated ability has resolved, the token that ability creates will still be exiled at the beginning of the next end step.

If an effect such as that of Doubling Season causes Arcane Artisan’s first ability to create two tokens, its last ability will exile both of those tokens. However, if something becomes a copy of the token or creates a copy of that token later (such as Evil Twin or Cackling Counterpart), that copy won’t be exiled.
If multiple Arcane Artisans are creating tokens, each will exile only the ones it created.

If any of those tokens have an ability that triggers at the beginning of the end step, that ability will trigger and resolve even if the token is exiled during the end step before that ability resolves.

text:
{2}{U}, {T}: Target player draws a card, then exiles a card from their hand. If a creature card is exiled this way, that player creates a token that's a copy of that card.
When Arcane Artisan leaves the battlefield, exile all tokens created with it at the beginning of the next end step.
